answerBox.title: Top 5 Home Pizza Ovens of 2025
answerBox.answer: The landscape is shifting toward electric indoor/outdoor hybrids. The Breville Smart Oven Pizzaiolo and the Ooni Volt 12 are currently the highest-rated for consistency.

organic.title: The Best Pizza Ovens for Every Backyard and Kitchen
organic.snippet: Our mid-year update. We've added 5 new electric models to our testing lab to see if they can match wood-fired results.

organic.title: Ooni Koda vs Gozney Roccbox: The 2025 Showdown
organic.snippet: We compare the two giants of the industry. Does the new Roccbox update take the crown?

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Are electric pizza ovens as good as wood-fired?
